mapper.insert: insert into comments(song_id, user_id, comments_content, comments_time) value(#{songId}, #{userId}, #{commentsContent}, #{commentsTime})
mapper.select: select comments.song_id, comments.user_id, comments_id, comments_content, comments_time, song_name, user_name from comments, song, music_user where comments.song_id=#{songId} and comments.song_id=song.song_id and comments.user_id=music_user.user_id order by comments_time desc
